shortdesc.ph: Sets the playback mode of the music resource.
Sets the playback mode of the music resource.
Sets the playback mode for music resources.
Sets the playback mode of the music content.

section.p: You can call this method to set the playback mode to original, accompaniment, or guide vocals. If you do not call this method, accompaniment is played by default; if the music resource does not have accompaniment, the original version is played.

You can call this method to enable original vocals, accompaniment, or guide vocals. If you do not call this method, accompaniment is played by default. If the music resource has no accompaniment, the original vocals are played.

You can call this method to enable original vocals, accompaniment, or guide vocals. If you do not call this method, accompaniment is played by default. If the music resource does not have accompaniment, the original vocals are played.

You can call this method to enable original vocals, accompaniment, or guide vocals. If you do not call this method, accompaniment is played by default; if there is no accompaniment, the original vocals are played.
section.note: You can get detailed information about the music resource through the callback, and determine the supported playback type of the copyrighted music to be played via the result parameter.
You can obtain detailed information about the music resource through the callback, and determine the supported playback types for the copyrighted music to be played via the result parameter.
You can obtain detailed information about the music resource via the callback and determine the supported playback types of the copyrighted music through the result parameter.
You can use the callback to obtain detailed information about the music content. The result parameter in the callback indicates the supported playback types of the copyrighted music.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: In entertainment scenarios such as online karaoke or live shows, if you need to play copyrighted music provided by the Agora content center, you can call this method to set the playback mode.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called after .
This method must be called after .
This method must be called after .
This method must be called after .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-2: Invalid parameter setting. Please reset the parameter.

< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-2: Invalid parameter setting. Please reset the parameters.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-2: Invalid parameter setting. Please reset the parameters.
